about_the_game:
Somewhere in the world, where the magic and fairy tales are far for gone yet, a big war of fantastic and powerful beings was fought. Now, only ruins from old empires remain and there are evil entities that want to take control over the recently raided. Your MASTER is one of them and you, his faithful minion, must obey and fulfill all of his wishes!
In this case, the witch came out of her swampy lands again to corrupt the entire landscape that your master likes to travel so much. It's time to make that evil witch stop once and for all her aspirations for expansion and never leave her dirty swamp again.

Gameplay


You are a little imp who, imbued with your master's powers, will make your way to the witch's house in her swamp, destroying enemies created by her and freeing all affected areas from their corruption. In this friendly and terrifying auto-battler, you will collect the souls of enemies trapped by the witch to power your own attacks. Level by level, you will unlock new powers that your master will give you and you will be able to put together your own set of attacks and skills to face everything that the witch can throw at you.

Features


Auto-attacker: dodge enemy attacks while collecting their souls to gain power. Each ability has different tiers to unlock.

Spells and tools: Not only you will have auto-attacks to overcome the challenges, also you will have many spells and potions that you will aim and cast against the enemies.



Lair actions: The witch will not give you a break. Each level have a lair action prepared to kill any invader.



Enemy variety: The swamp lady managed to deploy a big quantity of minions and monsters on the earth. Skeletons, stone golems and magic explosive pumpkins are a few of them.

Totem Bullet hell: A bullet storm will fall over you! The witch will overflood the map with turret totems that shoot fire! Dodge is the only option…



Two Modes Of Play: Endless and history

Original Soundtrack: Yeah!

name: Enough with the Witch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or superior
  • Processor: CPU X64 Dual Core a 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with 1 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or superior
  • Processor: CPU X64 Quad Core a 3+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU dedicada con 2 GB de VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Destroy the evil witch that contaminated the region and cursed their happy habitants to convert them into horrible (but cute) monsters. This auto attacker with deck building mechanics to customize your character presents a casual game, frenetic and fun, full of magic and adventure.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
